text:
Erin Grey Van Oosbree (born August 24, 1973), credited as Grey DeLisle () and Grey Griffin, is an American voice actress, comedian and singer-songwriter.
She is known for her voice roles as numerous characters of "The Powerpuff Girls" franchise, Vicky from "The Fairly OddParents", Samantha "Sam" Manson from "Danny Phantom", Mandy from "The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy", Frankie Foster, Duchess, and Goo from "Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends", Yumi Yoshimura from "Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi", Azula from ', Kimiko Tohomiko from "Xiaolin Showdown", as well as Lola, Lana, and Lily Loud from "The Loud House", and Prince Puppycorn from "Unikitty!."
She has been the voice of Daphne Blake in the "Scooby-Doo" cartoons and direct-to-videos and other appearances since 2000.

annotations.surface_form: The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy
